name: n8n-nodes-h2i
description: Davix H2I (PixLab) community node for n8n: H2I, Image, PDF, Tools endpoints

scripts.copy:icons: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src='nodes/DavixH2I/davixH2I.svg'; const dst='dist/nodes/DavixH2I/davixH2I.svg'; fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dst), {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(src,dst); console.log('Copied icon:', src, '->', dst);"
